wblut.hemesh.creators
Class HEC_VoronoiSphere

java.lang.Object
  wblut.hemesh.creators.HEC_Creator
      wblut.hemesh.creators.HEC_VoronoiSphere

public class HEC_VoronoiSphere
extends HEC_Creator

Creates the Voronoi cell of one point in a collection of points, constrained by a maximum radius.

Author:
Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
